p: If face-to-face meetings are not possible, virtual or teleconferences should be attempted. If members of local ECs cannot participate in meeting due to the emergency, the ethics review may be conducted by any other registered Indian EC. The EC should ensure that participant selection is fair and there are no additional burdens imposed on research participants.[ 9] The EC should conduct ongoing riskâ€“benefit assessment.
